    • Uses of Player in game.controller

      Methods in game.controller with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void GameController.gotoJail​(Player player)
      The method implements the action of a player going directly to jail.
      void GameController.makeMove​(Player player)
      This method implements a activity of a single move of the given player.
      void GameController.moveToSpace​(Player player, Space space)
      This method implements the activity of moving the player to the new position, including all actions associated with moving the player to the new position.
      boolean GameController.obtainCash​(Player player, int amount, boolean beforePurchase)
      This method implements the activity where a player can obtain cash by selling houses back to the bank, by mortgaging own properties, or by selling properties to other players.
      void GameController.offerToBuy​(Property property, Player player)
      This method implements the activity of offering a player to buy a property.
      void GameController.payment​(Player payer, int amount, Player receiver)
      This method implements a payment activity to another player, which involves the player to obtain some cash on the way, in case he does not have enough cash available to pay right away.
      void GameController.paymentFromBank​(Player player, int amount)
      This method implements the action of a player receiving money from the bank.
      void GameController.paymentToBank​(Player player, int amount)
      This method implements the activity of a player making a payment to the bank.
      void GameController.playerBrokeTo​(Player brokePlayer, Player benificiary)
      Action handling the situation when one player is broke to another player.
      void GameController.playerBrokeToBank​(Player player)
      Action handling the situation when a player is broke to the bank.
      void GameController.showTurnMenu​(Player player)
      Show the basic turn menu to player.
      void GameController.takeChanceCard​(Player player)
      The method implementing the activity of taking a chance card.
